macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Price Slides to Around $80,000 Amid Bearish Market Despite Bullish News
items.summary: Bitcoin has fallen to approximately $80,000, a level not seen since April, despite positive developments, as investors react to market pressures including fears of inflation hawks. Analysts note the cryptocurrency's slide accelerating in recent trading.

items.title: UAE-Tied Firm Signs $500M Secret Deal with Trump Family Crypto Venture
items.summary: Four days before President Trump took office last year, a UAE-linked investment firm secretly signed a $500 million deal with the Trump family's cryptocurrency project, raising concerns about unprecedented family monetization of the presidency.

items.title: Bullish Crypto News Fails to Halt Bitcoin's Market Drop
items.summary: Despite a backdrop of positive cryptocurrency news, Bitcoin struggles to hold gains amid broader market declines, highlighting a disconnect between fundamentals and price action.

items.title: Bitcoin Decline Accelerates on Inflation Hawk Concerns
items.summary: Crypto markets face heightened volatility as Bitcoin's slide intensifies, driven by investor fears over potential inflation hawks influencing policy.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Darren Aronofsky Debuts AI-Generated Revolutionary War Series
items.summary: Filmmaker Darren Aronofsky’s AI venture Primordial Soup released 'On This Day… 1776', a series recreating the American Revolution using Google DeepMind, with episodes dropping on the 250th anniversary of events via TIME’s YouTube channel. The project combines AI-generated visuals with SAG-AFTRA voice actors.

items.title: SAP Selected to Modernize UK HMRC Tax Infrastructure with AI
items.summary: HMRC has chosen SAP to overhaul its core revenue systems, placing AI at the center of the UK's tax administration strategy for enhanced efficiency.

items.title: Ex-Google Engineer Convicted of Stealing AI Trade Secrets
items.summary: A former Google engineer has been convicted for stealing AI trade secrets and is scheduled for a status conference on February 3, facing up to 10 years per count.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: February 2026 Game Releases Include Mewgenics and Resident Evil Requiem
items.summary: February 2026 is packed with new game releases, including Mewgenics, a game about breeding cats for battles, and Resident Evil Requiem, which returns players to Raccoon City for another zombie outbreak.

items.title: Marvel's Wolverine Confirmed as Most Anticipated Superhero Game of 2026
items.summary: Insomniac's Marvel's Wolverine is shaping up to be the most anticipated superhero game of 2026, marking Logan's first solo game since X-Men Origins Wolverine, following the success of Spider-Man 2.

items.title: The Wolf Among Us 2 Delayed as Telltale Upgrades to Unreal Engine 5
items.summary: Telltale's The Wolf Among Us 2 has been delayed at least a year as the studio upgrades to Unreal Engine 5 following the company's near-shutdown and subsequent rescue.

items.title: Invincible VS Fighting Game Coming to Multiple Platforms
items.summary: Invincible VS, a 3v3 tag fighting game with a single-player story campaign, is releasing on Xbox, PC, and Nintendo Switch 2 on May 29th, featuring brutal action gameplay and comic book visuals.

items.title: 2026 NHL Stadium Series Held at Raymond James Stadium
items.summary: The 2026 NHL Stadium Series took place between the Boston Bruins and Tampa Bay Lightning at Raymond James Stadium in Tampa, featuring outdoor hockey action and appearances from NHL and NBA legends.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: IPVanish Launches Threat Protection Pro
items.summary: IPVanish has launched Threat Protection Pro, a new feature designed to block malware even when users are not connected to a VPN. This enhances cybersecurity for remote users.

items.title: Windows 11 Desktop Bug Affects Users with Fix Available
items.summary: A Windows 11 bug is breaking the entire desktop for some users, but Microsoft has provided a fix to resolve the issue. Users are reporting cynicism over broader OS improvements.

items.title: Nothing Teases New Budget Headphones
items.summary: Leaks indicate Nothing is preparing more budget-focused headphones, potentially copying key traits from other affordable models to expand its audio lineup.

items.title: Two Affordable DJI Drones Leak Ahead of Potential Launch
items.summary: Leaks reveal two new affordable DJI drones that may evade the US ban, offering accessible options in consumer drone market.

items.title: India Offers Zero Taxes to Foreign Cloud Providers Until 2047
items.summary: India is incentivizing foreign cloud providers with zero taxes until 2047, conditional on data routing through Indian data centers to boost local infrastructure.

items.title: iOS 26.3 Introduces New Privacy Feature for iPhone Users
items.summary: iPhone users gain a new privacy protection feature in iOS 26.3, enhancing user data security with specific implementation details.

items.title: Sony Patents Touchscreen Controller for Accessibility
items.summary: Sony has patented a touchscreen controller that could advance gaming accessibility by allowing customizable configurations.

items.title: Tesla Delivers 100 Megapacks to Cortex 2 at Giga Texas
items.summary: Tesla has delivered 100 Megapacks to its Cortex 2 site at Gigafactory Texas, with chiller plant progress indicating the AI datacenter for Optimus is on track for summer operation.

items.title: Disney Confirms Unified Hulu-Disney+ App for Late 2026
items.summary: Disney is advancing its unified Hulu and Disney+ app, targeting a late 2026 release, aligning with potential price adjustments.
